prefs.label: Open In New Card
prefs.help: If enabled, tap to email will always open the email into new card. Normal behavior is that only tap-n-hold opens into new card.

prefs.label: Open to Background
prefs.help: If enabled, the main card will be focused after opening email into new card. Default behavior is that new card gets the focus.

prefs.label: Show Timestamps
prefs.help: Controls whether the timestamp should be shown or not for the messages.

prefs.label: Open in New Card
prefs.help: If enabled, tap to chat will always open the chat into new card. Normal behavior is that only tap-n-hold opens into new card.

prefs.label: Single Enter Sends
prefs.help: If enabled, single enter press always sends the message. Default behavior is that for SMS/MMS messages double press is needed.

prefs.label: Close After Sending
prefs.help: If enabled, the compose message and chatview card is closed after sending the message. Default behavior is that the card is left open.

prefs.label: Lowest Brightness
prefs.help: Sets the lowest possible value for keyboard brightness, if set to same than high value then fixed value is used.

prefs.label: Highest Brightness
prefs.help: Sets the highest possible value for keyboard brightness, if set to same than low value then fixed value is used.
